borrowSection.title: Borrow with Flexible Rates to Trade or Stake and Maximize Returns.

item1.ques: What is crypto staking and how does it work?
item1.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

item2.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. borrowSection.title: Borrow or Lend at a Fixed Interest Rate You Choose

oOrders.label: Ongoing Orders
oOrders.content: Check, adjust LTV, and repay matched orders

howItWorks.title: How Do Fixed Rate Loans Work?

step1.title: 1. Order placing
step1.content: Place a Borrow Order or select an existing order from the Borrow Market.

step2.title: 2. Select Collateral
step2.content: Select collateral asset(s) from the list of your spot wallet assets. The Loan-to-Value (LTV) should be lower than the Initial LTV.

step3.title: 3. Confirm Order
step3.content: Confirm the order details, including the estimated interest, terms, Margin Call LTV, etc. Your collateral assets will be frozen in your spot wallet once the order is placed.

step4.title: 4. Order Matchedg
step4.content: Once matched, your collateral moves to Binance custody, and you receive the borrowed amount (minus interest) in your spot wallet. Monitor LTV to avoid liquidation.

step5.title: 5. Repayment
step5.content: Repay by the expiry date to avoid penalties. After expiry, a 3x interest penalty applies hourly for 24 hours, then your collateral may be liquidated.

adv1.title: Stable and Predictable Costs for Borrowers
adv1.content: Lock in a fixed APR for a set duration, eliminating fluctuations and unexpected costs.

adv2.title: Efficient Automated Process
adv2.content: Enjoy easy, and automated borrowing and lending experience with auto-repay and auto-renew options available.

adv3.title: Attractive Fixed APR for Suppliers
adv3.content: Supply your assets for a customizable and fixed APR.

adv4.title: Multi-Asset Collateral
adv4.content: Borrowers can set multiple assets as collateral to reduce the risk of liquidation.

faq1.ques: What is crypto staking and how does it work?
faq1.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

faq2.ques: Can I unstake my crypto anytime?
faq2.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

faq3.ques: Do I earn rewards during the redemption period?
faq3.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

faq4.ans: Staking is the process of locking up your cryptocurrency to support the operations of a blockchain network. In return, you earn rewards—similar to earning interest. By staking your assets, you're helping validate transactions and secure the network. The longer you stake, the more rewards you can accumulate, depending on the token and network conditions.

stakeHero.title: Stake with Flexible Terms for Maximum Earnings
stakeHero.content: Earn passive income on your terms with flexible, high-yield staking options.

info1.title: Staking
info1.content: Staking lets you earn rewards on your crypto. You can stake or redeem anytime, Most assets have a redemption period with no rewards during that time.

info2.title: Term
info2.content: Your holding period for the product determines the yield. Flexible-term products allow you to access your investments as needed.

info3.title: Redemption period
info3.content: This is set by the staking protocol. Each cryptocurrency has its own waiting period for unstaking assets. No rewards or yield accrue during this time.

r2.part1: Final Trading Volume data is collected at
r2.part2: This snapshot time is used to build up the winners list.

r3.part1: One Competition - One Crypto asset rule. Only trades on
r3.part2: markets will be counted towards the competition’s results. All trading pairs for the asset are included.

rules.r4: Only users who apply for the competition by pressing the “Participate” button on the competition page are considered participants and may claim the prize. The applications close 12 hours before the competition ends.
rules.r5: Only one account per person is accepted.
rules.r6: Trading to yourself is not counted towards volume.
rules.r7: Each contestant's trading volume is calculated as total amount of the respective instrument (token or coin) traded in IndoEx starting from the time the user applied to participate in the competition.
rules.r8: Prizes are distributed in the form of crypto assets from the Prize Fund.

termsOfUse.title: Terms Of Use
termsOfUse.subTitle: IndoEx Exchange Terms of Use
termsOfUse.content: These Terms of Use prescribe the rights and obligations between Members (as described in Article 2, and including persons who were Members in the past) and Fisco Cryptocurrency Exchange Inc. (“we” or the “Company”) in connection with the online services “IndoEx Exchange” and “IndoEx Instant Exchange” that we provide (at the domain https: //Indoex.io/; the “Services”). Before using the Services, please read the “Explanation on Important Matters” and the full text of these Terms of Use (which includes all rules, explanatory documents, and other various regulations, etc. relating to the Services and posted from time to time on our website; the same hereinafter).

arti1.title: Article 1 Scope of application of Terms of Use

content.point1: These Terms of Use apply to us and the Members (in this Article 1, including persons who were Members in the past) and prescribe all matters concerning the rights and obligations of the Company and the Members in relation to the Services.
content.point2: It is a condition precedent of using the Services that each Member understands the content of the full text of the Explanation on Important Matters and these Terms of Use and agrees that these Terms of Use prescribe all matters concerning the rights and obligations of the Company and the Members in relation to the Services.
content.point3: If the Member is a minor, the Member must obtain the consent of his or her legal guardian before using the Services.
content.point4: If the Member uses the Services, it will be deemed that the Member has agreed that these Terms of Use prescribe all matters concerning the rights and obligations of the Company and the Member in relation to the Services.

content.point1: A person who wishes to become a Member must submit a membership registration application in accordance with our prescribed procedures. We may decide to refuse a membership registration application at our discretion, and only a person who has been accepted by us may become a Member.
content.ponit2: After a Member completes registration for the Services, we may ask the Member to again submit necessary documents designated by us if it is necessary to perform identity verification at the time of a transaction as prescribed by relevant law and ordinance or we otherwise deem it necessary...
content.point3: If the Member wishes to cancel his or her registration as a Member, the Member may cancel his or her Member registration in accordance with our prescribed procedures.

arti3.title: Article 3 Management of login ID and password

content.point1: The Member must manage his or her registered login ID and password at his or her own responsibility, and must not lend, assign, sell, or otherwise dispose of such information to a third party.
content.point2: We will verify the identity of the Member by confirming that the login ID and password entered when the user logs in to our website or uses the Services matches the pre-set login ID and password. If we treat the user as a genuine user as a result of such verification, transactions executed on the basis of such verification will be treated as valid unless the misidentification of the Member is due to reasons attributable to us.
content.point3: The Member bears all liability for damage caused by (i) leakage ID or password due to the reason attributable to the Member and (ii) unauthorized use or the like of his/her account by a third party using such leaked login ID and we will not bear any liability for such damage.
content.point4: If the Member becomes aware that the login ID or password has been stolen or is being used by a third party, the Member must immediately notify us to that effect and follow our instructions.

content.point1: If there is any change to the registration information of a Member, the Member must notify us by our prescribed method without delay regarding the changed information, and submit the necessary documents requested by us.

indoexVerify.title: IndoEx Verify
indoexVerify.content: We have created a page to verify Indoex channels and business accounts to prevent fraud. Below, you can check all official communication channels: social media groups, websites, email addresses, and business accounts.

terms.message: Please use Indoex Verify to check whether the source officially represents Indoex. email address, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook or Telegram ID.

noticeMessage.part1: Please do not contact any unofficial/non-verified sources or reveal your account details to them. For further queries, please contact

message.error: The source you entered is not verified and may not be an Indoex official
message.success: The source you entered is an official source of Indoex

nickName.content: This is your display name that will appear to others on the platform

photo.label: photo
photo.content: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account and make it recognizable

closeAcc.label: Close Account
closeAcc.content: Once you close your account, it is permanent and can't be restored

content.part1: Dear Valued Client, If you wish to permanently delete your account with IndoEx, please send an email through
content.part3: The request must be sent from the same email address used to register your account.

noticePoints.point1: Be aware that account deletion is permanent. After your account is deleted, you will lose access to it, including any transaction history or data.
noticePoints.point2: If you have any assets remaining in your account, please make sure to settle them. Otherwise, these assets will be lost and cannot be recovered after the deletion of account.

point3.part1: Although IndoEx can delete your account permanently as per request, please note that we must retain certain personal data for a specified period after deletion. This retention is required by law, such as AML/CFT regulations, or as may be necessary for handling any future disputes or claims. Your personal data will be deleted once the legally required retention period has elapsed. For reference, please see IndoEx

point4.part1: Additional information about how we store your personal data can be found in our

popUp1.whatIsItContent: Your anti-phishing code will appear in all IndoEx emails, helping you spot genuine communications and avoid scams.

terms.lFailed: Login Failed due to wrong credentials

terms.expDate: Expiry date of the key unbound to IP address is 100 days

note.label: Note
note.point1: We provides you with a strong REST and Websocket API, through which you can enjoy services such as Market Query, Automatic Trading, etc.please view the API document.
note.point2: One account can create up to 5 API secret keys.

point3.part1: To avoid loss of assets, please do not disclose your API Key to anybody. For security reasons, we recommend that each API Key should bind 5 IP addresses at most. If there is only one IP address, you can enter it directly.
point3.part2: If there are more than one IP addresses, you should separate them with comma (e.g. 192.168.1.1,192.168.1.2,192.168.1.3).

note.point4: For Trading API , a single IP restricts 100 requests per minute.
note.point5: Each API key is valid for 100 days and if crossed it will automatically change to inactive mode.

point6.part1: If you have any question please reach us
